Sentencas: In this paper the effect of systematic errors in gas temperature measurements on the thermal control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell system is demonstrated.
Titulo: The effect of bias in gas temperature measurements on the control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cells system

Sentencas: Three control schemes were tested under two different conditions.
Titulo: The effect of bias in gas temperature measurements on the control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cells system

Sentencas: First, the real gas temperature at the point of interest was used as input for the controller.
Titulo: The effect of bias in gas temperature measurements on the control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cells system

Sentencas: Second, the reading of the thermocouple that takes the measurement at the same point was used as input.
Titulo: The effect of bias in gas temperature measurements on the control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cells system

Sentencas: The second approach included the bias on the measurement due to radiation and heat conduction on the thermocouple.
Titulo: The effect of bias in gas temperature measurements on the control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cells system

Sentencas: The results showed an overestimation of temperatures with important influence on the system control.
Titulo: The effect of bias in gas temperature measurements on the control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cells system

Sentencas: Furthermore, in one case the system could not follow the required power demand and it failed.
Titulo: The effect of bias in gas temperature measurements on the control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cells system

Sentencas: A successful solution to the problem was obtained by increasing the dimension of the system's heat exchanger.
Titulo: The effect of bias in gas temperature measurements on the control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cells system
